meanings.sent1: The pencil with the slittier tip wrote more smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The fabric with the slittier texture felt rougher against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The slittier road made the car bounce like a bumpy ride at the amusement park.
meanings.sent4: Her slittier voice cut through the noise like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The slittier edges of the paper made it easier to tear.
